input.sentences: here is the family in the woods .
look at what we found | awkward looking monkey bars | i guess .
here are a couple of friends on their way to join us .
soaking up the sun and getting some rest .
my little girl had a busy day and fell asleep .
output.sentences: A few hippies took a walk in the woods and stumbled upon this crazy set of monkey bars!
Some of the hippies climbed all over those crazy monkey bars.
A couple of the hippies hung to the back and smoked a joint.
After all the fun the hippies were stoned and tired so they spread out blankets to rest.
The hippies and their babies slept very well and had sweet dreams.
